text:
Lisa Vanderpump certainly knows how important family is. She's a devoted wife and mother who basically treats the crew of Vanderpump Rules like they are actually her own kids. So you could imagine how emotional it was for The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills mom to reconnect with her late grandmother when she sat down with Tyler Henry on an upcoming episode of Hollywood Medium.

During the sit-down, Tyler reveals to the 90210 entrepreneur that while she may not always see evidence that her grandma is watching over her, she definitely is. It's a reveal that hits Lisa hard.

"Life is so short, really. We learn that sometimes when we lose people. It was very comforting to know that you know that she's still present in the universe, and she's somehow connected to me still," Lisa reflected about the supernatural encounter.

You can catch the full reading Wednesday at 8/7c. Preview, below.
title: Lisa Vanderpump's Reading on Hollywood Medium with Tyler Henry
